Field Documentation

uint32_t vpsissIpipeNf2Config::downShift

Down Shift value for look up table reference

Edge Detectio max

Edge Detectio min

Flag to enable/disable NF2

uint32_t vpsissIpipeNf2Config::enableLscGain

Flag to enable/disable LSC gain to threshold value

Intensity table

uint32_t vpsissIpipeNf2Config::spreadVal

Spread Value used when useLutSpr is set to false

uint32_t vpsissIpipeNf2Config::sprFactor[VPS_ISS_IPIPE_NF2_MAX_THR]

Spread Factor table

uint32_t vpsissIpipeNf2Config::threshold[VPS_ISS_IPIPE_NF2_MAX_THR]

Threshold table, used in filtering algorithm

uint32_t vpsissIpipeNf2Config::useLutSpr

Flag to use Lut based SPR, spread factor TRUE: Use Lut based Spread factor FALSE: Use Single Spread factor
